5 Conclusion Su et al. also proposed a new weighted fusion method called the four-section linear weighting method, which can
Becllenation af eliminate motion ghosts to a certain extent, but which is not suitable for scenes with excessive motion. Ye et al. separate
Sen aE the background using the three frames difference method and use the seamless fusion method to fuse the background of
the first N—1 frames. They finally match and merge the last frame with the mosaic image of the previous N—1 frames.
This method can also remove motion ghosts but may lose some motion information of the previous N—1 frames.
